what: Motor Trend Car Road Tests — mtcars
title: Motor Trend Car Road Tests — mtcars
text: data extracted 1974 Motor Trend US magazine, comprises fuel consumption 10 aspects automobile design performance 32 automobiles (1973–74 models).

title: Motor Trend Car Road Tests — mtcars
